Text: FYI: I forgot to mention that "The Bat" (Harry Hole #1) is scheduled for a US Release in July 2013. No word on when "The Cockroaches" (Harry Hole #2) will be getting the US Market treatment.
Thanks!  Look forward to getting the other 2 novels.

Great Uploads, thanks a ton!!!
BTW, any chance you have Michael Harvey's The Innocence Game or any David Leadbeater's novels.
Thanks again.
